items.title: Researchers uncover a link to autism—and it isn’t vaccines
items.description: The large meta-analysis is the latest to show a connection between autism and diabetes.

items.title: Republican officials are questioning Trump’s tariff regime behind the scenes, says Sen. Rand Paul. ‘They whisper in my ear: Free trade is good’
items.description: GOP donors and think tanks are starting to publicly denounce President Donald Trump’s policies, which led to a historic stock market rout.

items.title: Angry tourists are ditching vacations in the U.S. over Trump’s ‘bullying’: ‘The U.S. is not perceived as a welcoming destination’
items.description: The U.S. tourism industry expected 2025 to be another good year, but international arrivals are plummeting.

items.title: TodayTix CEO took over at 31. He tells aspirational Gen Zers to ditch the ‘fake it till you make it’ act if they actually want to be successful
items.description: While Amazon’s Andy Jassy aligns with Gen Z's “delulu” mindset, TodayTix’s CEO says faking it early in his career burned him out—and backfired.

items.title: Inside Blockworks’ plans to build the Bloomberg of crypto by packaging data and media
items.description: The landscape in crypto media has shifted rapidly, and Blockworks co-founder Jason Yanowitz sees a big opportunity.
